Disabled.description: flag that specifies if the interface is enabled (up) or not (down)

DisabledReason.description: the reason why the interface has been disabled

DisplayName.description: a nice display name/ description for the interface

Dns.description: the dns server that should be set if the interface is up, comma separated

DnsSearch.description: the dns search option string that should be set if the interface is up, will be appended to DnsStr

PeerDefAllowedIPs.description: the default allowed IP string for the peer

PeerDefDns.description: the default dns server for the peer

PeerDefDnsSearch.description: the default dns search options for the peer

PeerDefEndpoint.description: the default endpoint for the peer

PeerDefNetwork.description: the default subnets from which peers will get their IP addresses, comma seperated

PeerDefPostDown.description: default action that is executed after the device is down

PeerDefPostUp.description: default action that is executed after the device is up

PeerDefPreDown.description: default action that is executed before the device is down

PeerDefPreUp.description: default action that is executed before the device is up

PostDown.description: action that is executed after the device is down

PostUp.description: action that is executed after the device is up

PreDown.description: action that is executed before the device is down

PreUp.description: action that is executed before the device is up

PrivateKey.description: private Key of the server interface

PublicKey.description: public Key of the server interface

SaveConfig.description: automatically persist config changes to the wgX.conf file

AllowedIPs.description: all allowed ip subnets, comma seperated

CheckAliveAddress.description: optional ip address or DNS name that is used for ping checks

Disabled.description: flag that specifies if the peer is enabled (up) or not (down)

DisabledReason.description: the reason why the peer has been disabled

DisplayName.description: a nice display name/ description for the peer

Dns.description: the dns server that should be set if the interface is up, comma separated

DnsSearch.description: the dns search option string that should be set if the interface is up, will be appended to DnsStr

ExtraAllowedIPs.description: all allowed ip subnets on the server side, comma seperated

Mode.description: the peer interface type (server, client, any)

PostDown.description: action that is executed after the device is down

PostUp.description: action that is executed after the device is up

PreDown.description: action that is executed before the device is down

PreUp.description: action that is executed before the device is up

PresharedKey.description: the pre-shared Key of the peer

PrivateKey.description: private Key of the server peer

PublicKey.description: public Key of the server peer

Disabled.description: if this field is set, the user is disabled

DisabledReason.description: the reason why the user has been disabled

Locked.description: if this field is set, the user is locked

LockedReason.description: the reason why the user has been locked
